SELECT * FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO ORDER BY STUDENT_PK ASC

SELECT (SELECT count(tjsi.STUDENT_PK) FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi INNER JOIN TL_A_JOIN_DORM_APPLICATION tajda ON TJSI.STUDENT_PK = tajda.STUDENT_PK WHERE tajda.SELECTION_STATUS = 'Y' AND TAJDA.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y') - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TL_A_DORM_STUDENT WHERE STUDENT_PK IN (SELECT tjsi.STUDENT_PK FROM TL_JIC_STUDENT_INFO tjsi INNER JOIN TL_A_JOIN_DORM_APPLICATION tajda ON TJSI.STUDENT_PK = tajda.STUDENT_PK WHERE tajda.SELECTION_STATUS = 'Y' AND TAJDA.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y')) AS count FROM dual
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_A_DIARY WHERE TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-mm-DD') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-mm-DD') FROM dual)
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_A_EXIT WHERE TO_CHAR(APPLY_CREATE_AT, 'YYYY-mm-DD') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-mm-DD') FROM dual)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TL_A_JOIN_DORM_APPLICATION WHERE SELECTION_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_A_JOIN_DORM_APPLICATION WHERE SELECTION_STATUS = 'Y' AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_A_POINT WHERE TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM dual)
SELECT title FROM TL_A_DORM_NOTICE WHERE CREATED_AT = (SELECT MAX(CREATED_AT) FROM TL_A_DORM_NOTICE)
SELECT title FROM TL_A_DORM_FREEBOARD WHERE CREATED_AT = (SELECT MAX(CREATED_AT) FROM TL_A_DORM_FREEBOARD)
SELECT count(*) FROM TL_A_REQUEST_REPAIR WHERE TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM dual)
